title: Sunlit Bonsai in a Traditional Japanese Room
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, detailed 3D Anime illustration, vertical composition (9:16), a serene scene of a perfectly shaped bonsai tree with a twisting trunk, resting on a rustic wooden shelf. The scene is bathed in golden volumetric lighting and sunbeams streaming through a large Japanese window. Detailed exterior view of rolling green mountains and a bright blue sky with white clouds. Interior features tatami mat floor and shoji screen elements. High saturation, cel shading, peaceful atmosphere.
